title: Lisa Nandy – 2022 Comments on Admission by Rishi Sunak he Removed Funding from Deprived Areas
author: admin
summary: The comments made Lisa Nandy, the Shadow Secretary of State for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities, on 5 August 2022 following the comments made by Rishi Sunak in Tunbridge Wells.
content:
This is scandalous. Rishi Sunak is openly boasting that he fixed the rules to funnel taxpayers’ money to rich Tory shires. This is our money. It should be spent fairly and where it’s most needed – not used as a bribe to Tory members. Talk about showing your true colours.
